room_title: Escape room "Dr. Trott's Apothecary" by Time Traveler Escape Games in Charleston
room_description: Travel back in time to Charleston in 1867 during the worst storm in 50 years. Dr. Trott has been accused of kidnapping a mermaid and causing the storm. Enter his Apothecary (pharmacy), search for the mermaid and set her free to stop the storm.
